name: Why do I feel sad today?
name_original: Why do I feel sad today?
description:
I'm challenging myself to make a new game every month throughout 2019. For February's game I spent an afternoon exploring my own mental health journey over the last 8 months, inspired by a conversation I had with my friend iRNY. 

This game is intensely personal to me and my own development. It may not be applicable advice to anyone else.

I'd like to thank all of my friends, they have always been  the biggest champions in my life. You know who you are, and I love you.

Onwards to March!
